parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup plan. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> You must specify either **BackupPlanId** or **BackupSetDownloadTaskId**.

parameters.name: BackupSetDownloadTaskId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup set download task.

- For a full backup, call the [CreateFullBackupSetDownload](~~2869842~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

- For an incremental backup, call the [CreateIncrementBackupSetDownload](~~2869843~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. This prevents duplicate requests.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be a non-negative integer that does not exceed the maximum value of the integer type. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 30, 50, and 100.

> The default value is 30.
